app.name: ftpii
app.long_description:
ftpii is an FTP server.
To exit, hold A on controller #1 or press the reset button. To remount a device, hold B on controller #1. To specify a password, rename the apps/ftpii directory to apps/ftpii_YourPassword. To specify a password remotely, use the SITE PASSWD and SITE NOPASSWD commands.
A working DVDx installation is required for the DVD features.
